conbody.p: 1. What is a major benefit of content reuse in DITA? a) Makes topics shorter b) Reduces the need for XML editors c) Centralizes content maintenance d) Improves visual layout
2. Which DITA attribute would be most appropriate for filtering content between "Basic" and "Professional" software editions? a) audience b) platform c) product d) otherprops
3. Which DITA feature allows reuse of specific elements like steps or notes with automatic synchronization? a) conref b) href c) idref d) shortdesc

4. When should you use the copy-to attribute instead of conref? a) When you want automatic content synchronization b) When you need the same content to appear with different navigation contexts or URLs c) When you want to translate content into multiple languages d) When you need to filter content for different audiences

5. How does reuse benefit translation workflows? a) Requires translating all content separately b) Reused elements only need to be translated once c) Prevents translation d) Combines multiple languages into one topic
